TextView.android:text: In this round each person has its own quota of 5 questions and other questions passed to it from the previous level that did not answer. A person gets 10 seconds to answer the question intended for it, If the team, the question intended for gives a wrong answer, the quiz master will give the correct answer. If the team that the question intended for passes it. The next level get 10 seconds to answer it and is awarded 10 points for the right answer. The team members can discuss before giving the answer. If a team cannot answer a question they can pass it or after 10 seconds it gets automatically give to the time out dailog box. If a team is answering a question and the time passes, then the team gets to complete the answer and is awarded points for the right answer. There is no negative marking for wrong answer.
